result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Indigency hearing on November 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.

2:12 PM Defendant Gordon Wayne Harrison appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant filed petition for court appointed attorney. Matter to be set for indigency hearing.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.addlTxt:
1:28 PM Defendant Gordon Wayne Harrison appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Emmeline Lee appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter continued for defendant to contact public defenders office.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Waiver of No Contact Provision of Bond CLH
A victim in this matter has requested to be notified of all proceedings.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 21, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Activity:
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:00 PM Defendant Gordon Wayne Harrison appeared by video, in custody at the Rock County Jail.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Gordon Wayne Harrison.  Prosecuting attorney Mason C Braunschweig appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Court orders $500 with conditions: Defendant to have no contact with E.P or C.H., home, work, vehicle.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Risk Report
No contact directly or indirectly with victims EP and CH, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. Absolute sobriety.
